remarks: Scalar zero times a functional is the zero functional.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ldual0vs.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldual0vs.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldual0vs.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
ldual0vs.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldual0vs.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
ldual0vs.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` D ) $.
ldual0vs.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldual0vs.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldual0vs $p |- ( ph -> ( .0. .x. G ) = O ) $.
